name: Nocturne Skies
description:
After a village of witches loses all of its defenders in a mysterious mission, Arlene takes it upon herself to learn combat magic to defend her home. Now, she faces her ultimate test as the country is swept by a demonic invasion.  Use magical attacks and careful movement to get through the hordes of both enemies and bullets in this exciting experimental blend of FPS gameplay with Shoot Em' Up design!

Sounds effects obtained and modified from zapsplat.com
Music taken from "5 Chiptunes (Action)" by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
Grass texture  modified from texture by Lamoot: https://opengameart.org/content/grass-texture (copyright Blender Foundation | apricot.blender.org)
Other textures obtained from https://ambientcg.com/

All other assets by David Gómez.
